admin/editor.dispositionlayout.title: Disposition Layout
admin/editor.dispositionlayout.descripti: Order sections/blocks/components by dragging them on the interface
admin/editor.dispositionlayout.dispositi: This is the order on which the components are displayed. You can order them by dragging them. DON'T ADD A NEW ONE, this action won't produce a result
admin/editor.dispositionlayout.order.ite: This number corresponds to a component on the list. If empty, you can delete it.
admin/editor.dispositionlayout.show.item: Controls if this component is shown or hidden
